attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring back the death sentance for murder.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions on this issue already
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=death+penalty
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=capital+punishment
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
